citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:02pm on 16-FEB-
2023.
The inspector arrived at the facility and tried calling and texting the known contact numbers with no response. The
inspector then knocked on the door and rang the doorbell. A person at the facility opened the door and stated the
licensee would not be available. There was no response by phone or text by the licensee after 30 minutes. No authorized
representative was available for this inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:02pm on 16-FEB-
2023. 
The inspector arrived at the facility and tried calling and texting the known contact numbers with no response.  The 
inspector then knocked on the door and rang the doorbell.  A person at the facility opened the door and stated the 
licensee would not be available. There was no response by phone or text by the licensee after 30 minutes.  No authorized 
representative was available for this inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
